dict.acceptation: 关系；联系；浪漫关系；血缘关系；

sent.trans: 试比较relation、 relations、 relationship这叁个词。

sent.orig: Relationship has the widest use, covering many of the meanings of relation and relations.
sent.trans: relationship用法最广，包括了relation和relations的许多含义。

sent.orig: Relationship can indicate a strong emotional association.
sent.trans: relationship可以指强烈的感情联系。

sent.orig: Relationship stage has impact on relationship drivers, relationship commitment and relationship value.
sent.trans: 关系发展阶段对关系驱动因素、关系承诺和关系价值存在影响。

sent.orig: Modern love has three stages of relationship: kiss relationship, sex relationship and no relationship.
sent.trans: 当代情侣关系的三个阶段，总共九字：吻关系。性关系。没关系。
